title: go.weekly.2012-03-04.src.tar.gz build error on RHEL 4.8
body:
Nice to see go.weekly.2012-03-04.src.tar.gz doesn't depend on "hg".

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. download go.weekly.2012-03-04.src.tar.gz
2. tar xzvf go*
3. cd go/src;./all.bash

What is the expected output?

go got built.

What do you see instead?

bash-3.00$ ./all.bash
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, linux/amd64.
lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
cmd/cov
cmd/nm
cmd/objdump
cmd/pack
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
<snipped>
compress/gzip
archive/zip
compress/zlib
image/png
cmd/api
exp/types
exp/gotype
runtime/cgo
net
os/user
# os/user
lookup_unix.go:31: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__1' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:33: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__2' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:35: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__3' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:39: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__5' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:41: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__6' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:43: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__7' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:45: error: enumerator value for `__cgo_enum__8' not integer constant
lookup_unix.go:47: error: syntax error before "char"
lookup_unix.go:49: error: syntax error before "int"
lookup_unix.go:51: error: syntax error before "size_t"
lookup_unix.go:53: error: syntax error before "long"
lookup_unix.go:56: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:57: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:58: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:60: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:61: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:62: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:63: warning: initialization makes integer from pointer without a cast
lookup_unix.go:64: error: syntax error before "char"
# net
cgo_linux.go:16: error: syntax error before "int"
cgo_linux.go:21: error: syntax error before "int"
bash-3.00$




Which operating system are you using?

bash-3.00$ cat /etc/redhat-release
Red Hat Enterprise Linux AS release 4 (Nahant Update 8)
bash-3.00$
